text: mariyu yudulu mariyu kraistavulu ila antaru: "Memu allah santanam mariyu ayanaku priyamaina varamu." (Varito) ila anu: "Ayite, ayana mi papalaku mim'malni enduku siksistunnadu? Ala kadu, miru kuda ayana puttincina manavulalo okaru matrame! Ayana tanu korina varini ksamistadu mariyu tanu korina varini siksistadu. Mariyu akasalalo, bhumilo mariyu vati madhya unna samastam mida samrajyadhi patyam allah de mariyu ayana vaipunake (andariki) marali povalasi undi
